newsitem.title: JAPAN: Vickers, Komatsu agree to cooperate in hydraulics.
newsitem.headline: Vickers, Komatsu agree to cooperate in hydraulics.

text.p: Vickers Inc of the United States said on Friday that it and Komatsu Ltd have agreed to cooperate in the sale and development of mobile hydraulic products and related technologies.

Under the agreement, the two companies will establish a joint venture in Japan to sell a range of hydraulic products manufactured by Vickers, Komatsu and its affiliate, Komatsu Zenoah Ltd, under the Vickers brand, Vickers said in a statement.
The venture is expected to start operations in May, the statement said.
Vickers will also start worldwide sales of Komatsu and Komatsu Zenoah's hydraulic products of under the Vickers brand.
The two companies will also jointly develop new hydraulic products, the statement said.
Komatsu is a major manufacturer of construction equipment.
Vickers, a unit of U.S.-based Trinova Corp, makes hydraulic and electric components for the aerospace, automotive, industrial and electronics industries.
